Set.Text: In addition to the regular abilities of the Stable, the Ducal Stable increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Pasture tiles and +15 XP for Mounted Units. Only the Polish may build it.

Unique Polish Stable replacement. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP for Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each Pasture worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
